tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  provider_id UUID NOT NULL,
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
  follow_up_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE follow_up_visits (
  follow_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  follow_up_date DATE,
  follow_up_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Appointment (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Provider (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(100),
	phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
	appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	provider_id INT,
	appointment_date DATE,
	appointment_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE providers (
	provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	provider_name VARCHAR(100),
	specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE follow_up (
	follow_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	appointment_id INT,
	follow_up_date DATE,
	follow_up_time TIME,
	follow_up_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider (
  provider_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE appointment (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient,
  provider_id UUID REFERENCES healthcare_provider,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  appointment_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE follow_up (
  follow_up_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointment,
  follow_up_date TIMESTAMP,
  follow_up_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medication (
  medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  follow_up_id UUID REFERENCES follow_up,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20)
)
